channel.title: How do you make a client from scratch? + A client with the butten screenshot
channel.description:
How do you make a client from scratch? Also can you make one from Scratch?
Is there a client where we can edit it with the butten screenshot so members can post screen shots of themselves?
Thanks :)

item.title: How do you make a client from scratch? + A client with the butten screenshot
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

[quote=“ninjaxr, post:3, topic:305689”][quote author=i pk girls link=topic=401908.msg2978753#msg2978753 date=1254466878]

How do you make a client from scratch? Also can you make one from Scratch?

Is there a client where we can edit it with the butten screenshot so members can post screen shots of themselves?

Thanks

um you can make from scratch but you can’t lol
[/quote]
Very spefic my friend oh and i think you gotta go the old bases way because even if you start from scratch your just gonna have to leech someones programming sometime[/quote] Just get a client and edit it. Theres no use wasting your life on a client

Read full topic
